class.name: Bullet
class.description: Representation of a controllable bullet. A [Bullet] is a minimal representation of a simulated projectile. It does not perform any automatic processing or colliding of its own, instead relying on a [BulletServer] or other external script to drive it. It contains simple state information, a [CanvasItem] [RID] to draw to, and a [BulletData] resource which defines its appearance, collision information, and behaviour.

method.name: can_collide
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this [Bullet]'s data contains a collision shape and an active collsion mask.

method.name: get_ci_rid
method.description: Returns the [RID] of the [CanvasItem] associated with this [Bullet].

method.name: get_data
method.description: Returns the [BulletData] currently held by this [Bullet].

method.name: get_direction
method.description: Returns a [Vector2] reprenting this [Bullet]'s current direction of travel.

method.name: get_position
method.description: Returns the current position of this [Bullet].

method.name: get_rotation
method.description: Returns the current rotation of this [Bullet].

method.name: get_time
method.description: Returns the amount of time this [Bullet] has been active since spawning, in seconds.

method.name: get_transform
method.description: Returns a transform representing this [Bullet]'s position, rotation, and the scale set by its [BulletData].

method.name: is_popped
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this [Bullet] has popped and is awaiting cleanup.

method.name: pop
method.description: Marks this [Bullet] as inactive and ready to be cleaned up by the server, and disables its visibility.

method.name: set_data
method.description: Sets the [BulletData] that will be used to define this [Bullet]'s appearance and behaviour. Causes the [CanvasItem] to update to reflect texture or material changes.

method.name: set_direction
method.description: Sets the [Vector2] that defines the direction in which this [Bullet] will travel.

method.name: spawn
method.description: Resets this [Bullet]'s age and state, then deploys it at the given [code]position[/code], in [code]direction[/code], with the traits of [code]data[/code].

method.name: update
method.description: Updates this [Bullet]'s age and position, using its currently loaded [BulletData]. Will automatically pop if the data has a lifetime limit set and this bullet's live time exceeds it.
